issue.title: [C++] Remove ExecBatchIterator and usages thereof
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16929](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16929). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The only place left using it is in GroupBy in arrow/compute/exec/aggregate.cc. This can be refactored to use ExecSpan. 

As part of this removal, we should adapt the benchmarks for ExecSpanIterator to demonstrate the performance improvement there
